effect.sun_moon: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes all Pokémon’s normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.
